sqlMap.select: select ql.QUERY_LOOKUP_ID, ql.SQL_QUERY, ql.SECTION_NAME, ql.SITE_NAME, , param.QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM_ID, param.PARAM_NAME from QUERY_LOOKUP ql inner join FIELD_DEFINITION fd on ql.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join QUERY_LOOKUP_PARAM param on ql.QUERY_LOOKUP_ID = param.QUERY_LOOKUP_ID where (ql.SITE_NAME = #siteName# or ql.SITE_NAME is NULL) and ql.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinitionId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into QUERY_LOOKUP (SQL_QUERY, SECTION_NAME, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SITE_NAME) values (#sqlQuery#, #sectionName#, #fieldDefinition.id#, #site.name#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update QUERY_LOOKUP set SQL_QUERY = #sqlQuery#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinition.id#, SITE_NAME = #site.name# where QUERY_LOOKUP_ID = #id#
